name: Derelict (itch) (Laughing Dragon Games)
description:
Have you ever wanted to just keep shooting?

Derelict is a fast action game with unending hordes of enemies coming at you in more than thirty levels of mayhem. Play with either of two different characters: Rachel Riveter, who's gun shoots streams of rivets, and Demolition Ralph, who's love for explosions really helps him out of some tight spots against seven different alien creatures. And if you've got a friend around, pull up a gamepad and have them help you clean out the aliens!

Derelict was originally released in 2004, and this version has been updated to work around various issues that came up between then and now. Hope you enjoy it!
